trends: There have been 13 other sightings in Moab
There were no other sightings in Moab on or around June 22nd 2007
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: from east to west across horizon no sound got out binoculars pulsing disc seen
divs: Sighting Details Was on the deck having a smoke looked west toward canyon rim.over the Colorado river.A bright light appeared in the western sky as dusk was settling in. I thought it was the sun glinting off of an airplane, yet as it got closer I knew this was different. I yelled at my girlfriend to get the binoculars she came right out and I got focused in and it was a disc. The disc was pulsing a bright light and its speed remained constant as it flew across the entire sky . It was lower than comercial jets fly but still npretty high up. There was no sound no vapor trail. On June 23 2007 at about 10:30 pm mountain time my step son and his friends were at Sand Flats Recreation area they saw a disc pulsing as I had seen the night before. I felt fine I really enjoyed seeing the disc I know it was a UFO I could sense it in my gut. I have seen one other UFO in my life and believe that we are not alone.
